start.commands:
printf 'Launching Courier
' >> SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log 2>&1
SERVICE_ROOT/exports/courier start && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/authdaemond start && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/imapd-ssl start && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/esmtpd start && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/esmtpd-msa start && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/esmtpd-ssl start && echo 'success'

stop.commands:
printf 'Stopping Courier
' >> SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log 2>&1
SERVICE_ROOT/exports/courier stop && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/authdaemond stop && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/imapd-ssl stop && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/esmtpd stop && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/esmtpd-msa stop && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/esmtpd-ssl stop && echo 'success'

reload.commands:
printf 'Reloading Courier
' >> SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log 2>&1
SERVICE_ROOT/exports/makeuserdb && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/makeacceptmailfor && SERVICE_ROOT/exports/makehosteddomains && echo 'success'
